New Folder

Use the New Folder dialog box to create a new folder.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Folder name Enter a name for the folder. The name must be unique within the project in which the folder resides. The name cannot begin or end with a tab or blank space. Any character can be used in the name except an asterisk (*), a colon (:), a vertical bar (|), forward and backward slashes (/ \), a question mark (?), and angle brackets (< >). No project name can be the two character name of .. or the one character name of . or @.

See Also

Naming Conventions
